title: Service dependency
content:
This section describes the services and their dependencies for both OPTIC Management Toolkit (OMT) and Service Management.

  • OMT services
  • Suite common services
  • Smart Analytics services
  • Virtual Agent services
  • Suite services
  • Suite Administration services

System architecture diagram

The following is a high-level architecture diagram of the suite.

OMT services

For details, see the OMT documentation.

Suite common services

Service

Description

Dependency

idm

The Identity Manager (IdM) service, which manages user identities and user security-related information.

 kubernetes-vault, PostgreSQL database
autopass-lm-v2 A service for license management. kubernetes-vault, PostgreSQL database
itom-ingress-controller A service that, as the entry point for external requests to SMA, routes HTTP and HTTPS traffic from external sources to internal Kubernetes services. It uses the Nginx web server as a reverse proxy and load balancer to distribute traffic to the appropriate Kubernetes pods. None

itom-itsma-certificate-deployment

A certificate management service for outbound integration.

 kubernetes-vault

Smart Analytics services

Service

Description

Dependency

smarta-admin-ui-backend

A service for the suite config UI for Smart Analytics.

None

smarta-data-source

A service for fetching data sources from Postgres for Smart Ticket.

None

smarta-installer

A service that installs all Smart Analytics components.

None

smarta-ocr

A service that retrieves text from images for Smart Ticket.

None

smarta-saw-con

A service that stores indexed records of the latest 3 months for Smart Search.

smarta-installer

smarta-saw-con-a

A service that stores indexed records of the latest 3 months for Smart Search.

smarta-installer

smarta-saw-dah

A service that queries records of the latest 3 months for Smart Search.

Pod: smarta-saw-con-0

smarta-saw-dih

A service that performs indexing of records of the latest 3 months for Smart Search.

 Pod: smarta-saw-con-0

smarta-saw-proxy

A service that performs the Indexing action for Service Portal.

None

smarta-sawarc-con

A service that stores indexed records older than 3 months for Smart Search

smarta-installer

smarta-sawarc-con-a

A service that stores indexed records older than 3 months for Smart Search.

smarta-installer

smarta-sawarc-dah

A service that queries records older than 3 months for Smart Search.

Pod: smarta-saw-con-0

smarta-sawarc-dih

A service that performs the indexing of records older than 3 months for Smart Search.

Pod: smarta-saw-con-0

smarta-sawmeta-con

A service that stores indexed metadata for Smart Search.

smarta-installer

smarta-sawmeta-con-a

A service that stores indexed metadata for Smart Search.

smarta-installer

smarta-sawmeta-dah

A service that queries metadata records for Smart Search.

Pod: smarta-saw-con-0

smarta-sawmeta-dih

A service that performs the indexing of metadata records for Smart Search.

Pod: smarta-saw-con-0

smarta-search

A service for Service Portal search.

None

smarta-smart-ticket

A service for Smart Ticket functions.

None

smarta-smart-ticket-task

A service for Smart Ticket training.

smarta-installer
smarta-smart-ticket-admin-ui A service for the Smart Ticket and Smart Search config UI. None

smarta-stx-agent

A service that stores agents and profiles.

smarta-installer
smarta-stx-category A service that performs categorization for Smart Ticket. Pod:smarta-sawarc-dah-0
smarta-stx-agent

smarta-stx-media

A service that analyzes and extracts content on the image server.

smarta-installer

Virtual Agent services

Service

Description

Dependency

virtual-agent-admin-ui

A service for the Virtual Agent administrator management UI, including:

  • Virtual Agent Setting
  • CRUD of intents
  • Triggering of training

itom-xruntime-gateway

itom-xruntime-platform

kubernetes-vault

virtual-agent-bot-engine

A service for the engine that manages VA sessions and requests and distributes requests to Service Management based on the results of Natural Language Understanding (NLU). 

itom-xruntime-gateway

itom-xruntime-platform

kubernetes-vault

virtual-agent-nlu

A Natural Language Understanding (NLU) service that leverages RASA.

itom-xruntime-gateway

itom-xruntime-platform

kubernetes-vault

Suite services

Service

Description

Dependency
sm-chat Service Manager (SM) chat service and Openfire, SM chat request, and live chat support kubernetes-vault
sm-gateway Provides simplified REST services to access Service Manager, provides session management, request concurrency management, SM software load balancer support, catalog and catalog item image caches, form caches, TLS support, and so on.  kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-rabbitmq A message broker that provides a framework for processing, routing, and messaging between applications kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-redis Shared cache service kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-xmpp The push message engine (Openfire) kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-lcm The pod initializes xruntime databases, prepares xruntime platform, and creates the out-of-the-box tenant.

kubernetes-vault

itom-bo-user-deployment

itom-bo-user-offline-deployment

smarta-saw-proxy
itom-xruntime-gateway An edge service that acts as an API gateway, for user authentication, license checking, and request forwarding to the platform, and rewriting URLs

itom-xruntime-serviceportal

kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-platform It provides core and universal platform services for different applications, such as Entity Management Service for CRUD of records, Metadata Service for all record types, Workflow Service for workflows across record types, and so on. 

itom-xruntime-lcm

kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-platform-offline For offline computing (such as SLT calculation) and job execution

itom-xruntime-lcm

kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-platform-offline-ng

For fulfilling requests (such as Native SACM) dispatched from the offline pod.

Kubernetes-vault

itom-xruntime-redis

infra-rabbitmq

PostgreSQL Server
itom-xruntime-platform-readonly It provides APIs for querying platform EMS or RMS data only.

itom-xruntime-lcm

kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-serviceportal The self-service portal API service (business backend App)

itom-xruntime-platform

kubernetes-vault
itom-xruntime-ppo Project portfolio optimization for maximizing the business value of programs, projects, or proposals, without breaking resource and budget constraints, within the timeframe that you specify None
itom-sma-ui New UI for ESS None
itom-xruntime-ui An Nginx server that hosts static web content such as Javascript, css, and images, and also routes requests to the agent UI. None
itom-xruntime-websocket-gateway A service that sends instant messages to the OPB agent. It's used by near-real-time data exchange between SAMX and an on-premises system. None
itom-xruntime-datahub Provides read-only data integration service API in the OData protocol itom-xruntime-rabbitmq,itom-xruntime-redis,kubenetes-vault
itom-xruntime-opb-ui An Nginx server that hosts the OPB agent installation package kubenetes-vault
itom-sma-xie A native integration framework ("Integration Studio")

kubenetes-vault

itom-scheduler
itom-scheduler A backend scheduler API for the Integration Studio itom-xruntime-gateway
sam-backend-deployment Compliance service for Software Asset Management (SAM) None
sam-ui-deployment A service for the SAM UI sam-backend-deployment

Suite Administration services

Service Description Dependency
itom-bo-ats-deployment Customer, account, and tenant management. kubernetes-vault, PostgreSQL database
itom-bo-config-deployment System-wide configuration management. kubernetes-vault, PostgreSQL database
itom-bo-facade-deployment A service that acts as a facade for receiving requests from external sources and distributing them to different domain services. 
itom-bo-login-deployment Manages login and logout, and gets access tokens for the suite. kubernetes-vault, PostgreSQL database, idm-svc
itom-bo-license-deployment  A service for license, license pool, and license assignment management. kubernetes-vault, PostgreSQL database
itom-bo-ui-deployment A service that hosts Suite Administration UI static resources, such as html, js, and css.
itom-bo-user-deployment A service for user management. kubernetes-vault, PostgreSQL database, itom-bo-ats-svc
itom-bo-fo-ui-deployment A service that hosts the myhome UI static resources, such as html, js, and css.
itom-bo-user-offline-deployment  A backend service that manages user sync jobs. kubernetes-vault, PostgreSQL database, itom-bo-login-svc

Cloud Management services

Service Description Dependency
itom-cgro-bootstrap-job                        Bootstrap job for Cloud Cost Reporting services (IDM seeding) idm
itom-cgro-costpolicy               Cost policy backend service  itom-cgro-bootstrap-job, cmp-scheduler
itom-cgro-deploy-controller-pod                         Cloud Cost Reporting deploy controller
itom-cgro-insights                       Insights backend service itom-cgro-bootstrap-job, rabbitmq
itom-cgro-insights-gateway              Insights frontend service cgro-insights
itom-cgro-policy-gateway               Cost policy frontend service  cgro-costpolicy
itom-cgro-showback                      Showback backend service itom-cgro-bootstrap-job, rabbitmq, cmp-scheduler
itom-cgro-showback-gateway              Showback frontend service cgro-showback
itom-cmp-accounts                       Common Accounts service for DND/Cloud Cost Reporting itom-cmp-bootstrap-job, rabbitmq
itom-cmp-bootstrap-job                        Bootstrap job for CMP services (IDM seeding) rabbitmq, idm
itom-cmp-config-controller                Configuration service for DND/Cloud Cost Reporting services itom-cmp-bootstrap-job
itom-cmp-deploy-controller-pod                           CMP Deploy Controller
itom-cmp-integration-gateway            Integration frontend service itom-cmp-bootstrap-job, accounts
itom-cmp-scheduler                       Scheduler service itom-cmp-bootstrap-job
itom-content-store-backend               Content store backend service itom-dnd-bootstrap-job
itom-content-store-gateway            Content store frontend service itom-dnd-bootstrap-job, content-store-backend
itom-dnd-bootstrap-job                          Bootstrap job for DND services (IDM seeding)
itom-dnd-cms-synchronizer             UD/UCMDB Synchronizer service itom-dnd-bootstrap-job, rabbitmq
itom-dnd-controller                   DND service itom-dnd-bootstrap-job
itom-dnd-deploy-controller            DND Deploy Controller
itom-dnd-image-catalog                Image Catalog (IA) backend service itom-dnd-bootstrap-job
itom-dnd-image-catalog-gateway         Image Catalog (IA) frontend service itom-dnd-bootstrap-job, dnd-image-catalog
itom-dnd-instance-management           Instance Management service (backend) itom-dnd-bootstrap-job
itom-dnd-operations-gateway         Operations Gateway service (frontend) itom-dnd-bootstrap-job
itom-dnd-platform-deploy-controller-pod                DND Platform Deploy Controller
itom-esm-api ESM API Service itom-dnd-bootstrap-job
itom-iac-controller IAC Controller service itom-dnd-bootstrap-job, rabbitmq
